name: Couples Therapy (lesbianspy)
description:
Xena and Gabrielle are having relationship trouble. So they decided to go to couples therapy! 

The balls and weapons represent their emotional state. You must keep everything in play at all times and like real couples therapy, there's no way to win! 

Your task is to move both Xena and Gabrielle simultaneously and keep every object going as long as you can. 

There's no end, just CMD + Q to quit when start to feel despondent. 

You can move Gabrielle up and down using W and S keys. Move Xena up and down using arrow keys. Play in full screen mode.
